original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 18.14. Cūḷantaraduka, Hetuduka
analyzed: cūḍantaraduka hetuduka

original: Sappaccayaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: sappaccayam hetum dhammam paṭicca na appaccayaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Sappaccayaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhataṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sappaccayam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na appaccayaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka saṅkhatam sappaccaya sadisa

original: Anidassanaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassanam hetum dhammam paṭicca na anidassanaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Anidassanaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: anidassanam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sanidassanaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Appaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: appaṭigham hetum dhammam paṭicca na appaṭighaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Appaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: appaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sappaṭighaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Arūpiṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: arūpim hetum dhammam paṭicca na arūpī na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Rūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: rūpim na hetum dhammam paṭicca na rūpī na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Arūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: arūpim na hetum dhammam paṭicca na arūpī na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā ekam pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Lokiyaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: lokiyam hetum dhammam paṭicca na lokuttaraḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Lokuttaraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: lokuttaram hetum dhammam paṭicca na lokuttaraḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe avigate cattāri

original: Lokiyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: lokiyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na lokuttaraḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Lokuttaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: lokuttaram na hetum dhammam paṭicca na lokiyaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā ekam hetuyā dve pe avigate dve

original: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: kenacid viññeyyam hetum dhammam paṭicca na kenacid viññeyyaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyam hetum dhammam paṭicca na na kenacid viññeyyaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuñca nakenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kenacid viññeyyam hetuñca na kenacid viññeyyam hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na kenacid viññeyyaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kenacid viññeyyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na kenacid viññeyyaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
